situation: An open rectangular tank mounted on a moving vehicle 6m long, 2m wide and 3m high is filled with water to a depth of 2.5 m.

subquestions.question: What is the maximum horizontal acceleration in m/sec<sup>2</sup> that can be imposed on the tank without spilling any water?
Determine the accelerating force on the liquid mass.
If the acceleration is increased to 6m/sec<sup>2</sup>, how much water is spilled out?
